items.notes: PRIORITY BOOST — G458 anomia link to Mat 24:12. Man of sin, restrainer, mystery of iniquity. Episunagōgē (2Th 2:1) = Mat 24:31 episunago.
trumpet, twinkling, mortal→immortal. Parallel to 1Th 4 AND Mat 24:31.
scoffers, day-as-1000-years, fire, days-of-noah, elements dissolve. Heb 12:26-27 shaking link.
Belshazzar's feast = narrative fulfillment of Jer 51 'drunken sleep'
full Babylon oracle companion. Birth pains (50:43), earth shaken (50:46)
Structural twin of Mat 24:9-14. Flatteries→know God→instruct many→sword→purge→time of end.
NEW — Babylon oracle SOURCE of Mat 24:29 cosmic signs. Sun/moon/stars = Babylon-fall vocabulary. Critical for literal-vs-symbolic question.
'peace peace when there is no peace' = source of 1Th 5:3 'peace and safety'

PRIORITY BOOST — CLOUD=SMOKE connection. Ex 19:18 Sinai cloud IS smoke. Rev 9:2 smoke darkens sun. Rev 18:9,18 smoke of Babylon burning. Joel 2:30 pillars of smoke. Son of Man 'in the clouds' = appearing through the smoke of the old order's collapse. Gen 15:17 smoking furnace at covenant. Also: Mat 24:30, Dan 7:13, Rev 1:7, 1Th 4:17.
great trumpet, gathering one by one, worship in Jerusalem. Rapture/gathering link. = Mat 24:31.
PRIORITY BOOST — five-tradition convergence in Mat 24:31 analysis. 1Th 4:16, 1Cor 15:52, Isa 27:13, Lev 25:9, Lev 23:24.
Fifth seal: martyrs under altar for word/testimony = Mat 24:14 marturion.
PRIORITY BOOST — Mat 24:22,24,31. Elect present during tribulation, targets of deception, gathered POST-tribulation.
'God hath not appointed us to wrath' (1Th 5:9). Key roadmap question.
Rev 2. Full lexical chain G266→G458→G459. G684 apoleia triple-link. Self-exaltation chain Isa14→Ezek28→Dan11→2Thess2. Deception apparatus traced. Fulfillment audit.

STUDY EXISTS — update needed: (1) sackcloth timeline: Rev 6:12 sun=sackcloth + Rev 11:3 witnesses=sackcloth 1260 days = concurrent period. (2) Rev 9:2 SMOKE darkens sun = mechanism of darkening. (3) Factor into 1260-day dependency tree. Study already at pipeline/symbols/sun-moon-stars.md.
opposite of alarmed-fear. H7965 shalom. Key roadmap word.
Rev 2: verified all claims. Added self-consuming fire (Ezek 28:18, Isa 47:14), Rev 9:17 counterfeit armor, armor-of-god bidirectional link.

COMPLETED — G4624/G4625/H4383/H3782/G4348. Trap-stick mechanism. Five patterns: persecution cascade, Christ-paradox, deliberate placement, idol-identity, purification. Dan 11:33-35 = Mat 24:9-14 structural twin.
Jesus substituted earthquake for sword. Jer triad member. v9 = sword arrives.
COMPLETED — G2098+G932+G2784+G3142+G3141+G3144+G5055+G5056. Teleo→telos chain: Rev 11:7+Rev 10:7+Mat 24:14. Marturion→marturia→martus→martyr semantic chain. Beast acts only after testimony finishes.
COMPLETED — God-first transfer (Isa 59:17→1Th 5:8→Eph 6:11). Composite symbol: each piece IS another symbol. Shield=door (G2375 from thura). Anti-armor (Lk 11:22, Rev 9:9,17).

Rev 1. H8064+G3772 dual-domain structure (physical sky + God's jurisdiction). 36 key passages traced. BDB 3 senses confirmed. Mat 24:29-31 5× cluster. Isa 34:5 H7301 sword-bathed-in-sky. Heb 12:27 interpretive key. Heaven-earth gap = Mat 6:10 problem. Directional patterns documented.
G529 civic escort meeting. Matt 25:6, Acts 28:15. Gathering = escort BACK.
1Th 5:2, Mat 24:43, 2Pet 3:10, Rev 16:15. Structural pattern.
Jer 51:39,57 drunken rulers sleeping forever. Distinct from SLEEP symbol.
'heart faint' H7401, 'heart troubled' G5015. Seat of covenant response.
STALE — alarmed-fear study found new Jer 51:46 connections.
NEW — dry bones + four winds + resurrection. Ezek 37:9 'come from the four winds' = Mat 24:31 'from the four winds.' National resurrection/gathering.

CRITICAL ANCHOR — witnesses 1260 days in sackcloth/smoke + beast from abyss kills them + 3.5 days dead + resurrection + ascend in cloud + 7th trumpet = kingdoms become Lord's + ark revealed. The 7th trumpet = last trump = Mat 24:31 = 1Cor 15:52. Teleo/telos chain: Rev 11:7 + Rev 10:7 + Mat 24:14. This is the convergence point.
COMPLETED — famine-of-the-word = Rosetta Stone for darkening. H7093 qets chain. H8242 sackcloth = G4526 Rev 6:12. Sequence maps to Rev 6-11 progression.

COMPLETED — 51 verses traced. H8242 saq → G4526 sakkos. Unified meaning: visible testimony of judgment — dark covering replacing glory. Smoke=sackcloth mechanism confirmed. Amos 8:9-12 sequence mapped. Rev 11:3 + Rev 6:12 convergence documented.
GAP — H7093 qets chain anchor. 'Time of the end' 3×. Words sealed. Daniel stands at qets. Connects Amos 8:2 to eschatological timetable.
GAP — 'The qets has come upon the four corners of the land' (v2,6). Same formula as Amos 8:2. Morning come (v7,10). Rod blossomed, violence risen. Full qets oracle.
BIDIR — Amos 8 integration adds darkening→famine mechanism. Famine of word = RESULT of sun going dark = witnesses killed. Add contexts/Amos/8.001-014 as dependent.
BIDIR — Amos 8:2 H7093 + v10 H319 dual-end vocabulary. Add contexts/Amos/8.001-014 as dependent.

COMPLETED — 15/15 symbol convergence. PIT (H953 bor) = Rev 9:1 abyss. Dual pit-words (H6354 trap vs H953 dungeon). TOHU city = Gen 1:2 creation-reversal. Wine+earthquake fusion v20. Many-days gap = DAY_AS_1000_YEARS. v23 = Rev 11:15 7th trumpet.

GAP — Isa 24-27 is a UNIT (Isaiah Apocalypse). Ch25: feast of fat things, destroy death (= Rev 21:4), wipe tears. Ch26: 'thy dead shall live' = resurrection. 26:20 'enter chambers, shut doors' = hiding during wrath = Mat 24:16 flee. Must integrate as continuation.
GAP — punish leviathan (v1) = Rev 20:2 dragon. Great trumpet (v13) = Mat 24:31. Gathered one by one (v12). Vineyard song (vv2-6). Completes the Isaiah Apocalypse unit.
GAP — Satan bound in pit/abyss 1000 years = Isa 24:22 many-days-in-pit pattern. Loosed then judged = 'after many days visited.' Direct structural parallel.

PRIORITY BOOST (from 82→88) — H953 bor + H6354 pachath + G12 abyssos + G5421 phrear. Joseph's pit, Isa 24:22 dungeon, Rev 9:1-2 smoke source, Rev 11:7 beast from pit, Rev 17:8 beast ascends, Rev 20:1-3 Satan bound. Two Hebrew pit-words with different functions. THE HINGE between Isa 24 and Rev 9-11.
PRIORITY BOOST — H423 alah in Isa 24:6 devours the earth. Zech 5:3 curse on flying scroll. Covenant imprecation chain.

COMPLETED — Army IS the smoke IS the darkening. Northern army = Babylon. Dual trumpet (warning + gathering). v30 smoke→darkening chain explicit. Spirit outpouring = witness period opens. Birth-pains + earthquake + darkening = Rev 6:12 cluster. NAME = covenant deliverance.
GAP — Peter quotes Joel 2:28-32 at Pentecost. 'THIS IS THAT.' Places church age INSIDE 'before the great day' window. Spirit outpouring = witness period launched. Joel's smoke-era = NOW.

GAP — Four-stage locust army (v4: H1501 gazam, H697 arbeh, H3218 yeleq, H2625 chasil). Precursor to Joel 2 army. Drunkards awake (v5) = SLEEP. Fig tree stripped (v7). Meal/drink offering cut off (v9,13) = FAMINE.
GAP — Paul quotes Joel 2:32 'whosoever shall call on the name of the LORD.' NAME = COVENANT. Expands covenant invitation to all. Pairs with Acts 2 quotation.
GAP — Evil from the NORTH (v14). Almond rod + seething pot. Babylon = northern destroyer pattern. Source for Joel 2:20 'northern army.'

COMPLETED — 14-symbol convergence. HARVEST=Rev 14:15-20 same vocabulary. Valley of decision=threshing floor (H2742 charuts). Darkening oracle #8 + kingdom-assertion from Zion simultaneous. Wine inverts: wrath→blessing. Sword inversion (plowshares→swords). Egypt/Edom = typological Babylons.

COMPLETED — 11/11 symbol convergence. Cloud=mechanism proof-text (H6051 anan). Nation-specific darkening destroys astronomy reading. Dual animal (lion+dragon). Mountain cast down. Sword+trembling pair. Egypt=Babylon enslavement face. Judgment-mode darkness. Blood=creation-reversal.

GAP — No pipeline study exists. Eze 32:6 water with blood. Rev 6:12 moon as blood. Rev 8:8 sea becomes blood. Joel 2:30-31 blood+fire+smoke. Exod 7:17 Nile to blood = first plague. Rev 16:3-4 rivers become blood. Co-occurring with SUN_MOON_STARS, FIRE, SEA.

GAP — Companion Egypt oracle. Egypt = great CEDAR (TREE symbol). Eze 31:12 felled, branches on mountains/valleys. TREE+MOUNTAIN convergence. Nations shake at fall (v16 = EARTHQUAKE). Dan 4 Nebuchadnezzar-tree parallel.
GAP — First plague: Nile to BLOOD. Template for Rev 8:8 sea→blood, Rev 16:3-4 rivers→blood. Eze 32:6 repeats eschatologically. Egypt's life-system (Nile) becomes death-system.

BIDIR — Eze 32:8 adds JUDGMENT-MODE darkness: God IMPOSES (H5414 nathan) darkness. Current study only covers concealed-disobedience dimension. Needs prophetic/judgment polarity where darkness = authority extinguished by decree.
BIDIR — Add contexts/Eze/32.001-010 as dependent. Cloud-mechanism proof-text strengthens sackcloth=smoke=cloud chain.

COMPLETED — Darkening oracle #10. H8582 ta'ah = DECEIVE chain. Cry peace = 1Th 5:3. No answer of God = Amos 8:11 famine. Mountain→forest = kingdom→thorns. Beast-mechanism (v5b). NAME false invocation (v11). Jer 26:18 self-citation.

GAP — False prophets source oracle. H8582 ta'ah (v13,32) = Mic 3:5. 'Prophesied in Baal' = HARLOT. 'Caused my people to err.' Directly parallels Mic 3 shepherd-inversion. Jer 23:17 'say unto them that despise me, the LORD hath said ye shall have peace' = Mic 3:5/11 exact pattern.

GAP — False prophets saying PEACE (v10,16). H8582 ta'ah people (v10). 'Daubed with untempered mortar' = whitewashed wall. Wall falls (v11-14). Direct parallel to Mic 3:5 peace-cry and Mat 23:27 whited sepulchres.

GAP — Failed shepherds oracle expanded. Mic 3:1-3 = Ezek 34:2-4 compressed. Feed selves not flock. Scatter→God gathers (v11-16). One shepherd David (v23). Covenant of peace (v25). SHEPHERD study source text. Critical for shepherd-inversion pattern.

GAP — Mic 3:12 SELF-CITATION within OT (v18). Elders cite Micah to defend Jeremiah. Hezekiah repented → judgment delayed. Pattern: prophecy→repentance→delay→corruption→fulfillment. Urijah killed (v23) = beast-mechanism.

GAP — IMMEDIATE CONTRAST to 3:12. Mountain of LORD established (4:1) = Isa 2:2. Nations flow to it (4:1-2). Law goes forth from Zion (4:2). Swords→plowshares (4:3). Kingdom restored AFTER the judgment. 3:12→4:1 = desolation→restoration.

DARKENING + COVENANT — sun goes down → horror of darkness → SMOKING FURNACE + burning lamp pass between pieces (v17). Covenant enacted IN darkness + smoke + fire. The original smoke-cloud-covenant pattern.
COMPLETED — smoke=mechanism of darkening, Isa 24:22 pit connection, 5 months=150 days flood, Abaddon/Apollyon bilingual naming, grass/tree symbol substitution.

GAP — G2586 kapnos. THE mechanism of darkening (Rev 9:2). Rev 18:9,18 smoke of Babylon burning. Joel 2:30 pillars of smoke. Gen 15:17 smoking furnace. Connects to sackcloth, clouds, fire. Critical for darkening-oracle chain.

GAP — G200 akris. Rev 9:3,7 locusts from smoke. Joel 1:4 locust army (four stages). Exod 10:4-15 plague. Nah 3:15-17 Nineveh's merchants as locusts. Composite creature (horses+crowns+faces+hair+teeth+breastplates+wings+tails). Each component a symbol.
GAP — G4651 skorpios. Power to sting/torment (Rev 9:3,5,10). Luke 10:19 authority over scorpions. Luke 11:12 scorpion vs egg. Ezek 2:6 'scorpions' = rebellious people. Deut 8:15 wilderness hazard.

GAP — G4735 stephanos (victor's wreath) vs G1238 diadema (royal diadem). Rev 9:7 'crowns LIKE gold' = counterfeit authority markers. Rev 6:2 white horse crown = G4735. Rev 19:12 Christ = many diadems G1238. Critical distinction.
Son of Man + clouds + given dominion/glory/kingdom (v13-14). Four beasts from sea = four winds stir nations. Already in queue via four-horsemen but needs own context for Mat 24:30 connection.

SHAKING — 'Yet once... shake heavens, earth, sea, dry land' (v6). Heb 12:26-27 interprets: removing shakeable things so unshakeable kingdom remains. Desire of all nations shall come (v7). Fill house with glory (v7).
MOURNING — look upon pierced + mourn (v10) = Mat 24:30 tribes mourn = Rev 1:7 every eye. Spirit of grace + supplications (v10). Each family mourns apart (v12). Recognition-repentance.
DARKENING AT THE CROSS — sun darkened (v45) + veil rent (v45). Authority structure went dark at covenant-transfer moment. Paired with EARTHQUAKE (Mat 27:51). The cross = prototype of all darkening.
ALREADY QUEUED but needs sun-moon-stars update: 4th trumpet 1/3 darkened (v12) = PARTIAL authority collapse. Not yet full darkening.
BIDIR — Mic 3:5 H8582 ta'ah adds OT false-prophet center to chain. Cry-peace mechanism. Add contexts/Mic/3.001-012 as dependent.
BIDIR — Mic 3:1-3,9-11 = shepherd-inversion. Eat the people, judge for reward, teach for hire. Add Mic 3 as defining bad-shepherd passage.
BIDIR — Mic 3:11 'lean upon the LORD... is not the LORD among us?' = false NAME invocation while breaking covenant. Add as Third Commandment example.
BIDIR — Mic 3:5 false prophets H8582 = Mat 24:11 G4105. Cry-peace chain now traced OT→NT. Beast-mechanism (Mic 3:5b) parallels Rev 11:7.
BIDIR — Mic 3:5 H7965 shalom cry = Jer 6:14 = 1Th 5:3 G1515 eirēnē. Full OT chain: Mic 3:5→Jer 6:14/8:11→Eze 13:10→1Th 5:3.
STALE — alarmed-fear + Mat 24 birth-to-delivery arc needs documenting.
STALE — alarmed-fear is new co-occurring symbol.
STALE — 2Chr 15:5-7 anti-fear command.
STALE — Mat 24:12 G458 anomia plethuno → 2Th 2:7 connection.
STALE — Isa 13:10 Babylon-oracle cosmic-darkening connection. Mat 24:29 = darkness symbol at cosmic scale. Study currently lacks prophetic/judgment dimension.
STALE — Hag 2:6 + Heb 12:26-27 'removing shakeable things' interpretation. Mat 24:29 = earthquake at cosmic scale.
STALE — Rev 12:14 eagle-wings extraction transport. Mat 24:28 ptōma/eagles dual meaning.

COMPLETED — Two-part weapon system: delivery mechanism (scroll=curse) + payload (woman=wickedness returned to Shinar). 8/11 symbols→FALL_OF_BABYLON. Written-both-sides chain. Scroll→sword→cherem chain. Anti-temple in Shinar. Lead etymology links to flying root.

CRITICAL — Tyre oracle = TEMPLATE for Rev 18. Merchant catalog, ships, self-deification, 'fire from midst of thee' (28:18), cherub/Eden connection, traffick=commerce as corrupting sin. Map quotation chains Ezek 27→Rev 18 exhaustively.

NEW — Babylon as WOMAN. 'I am, none else beside me.' Loss of children + widowhood IN A MOMENT IN ONE DAY (v9). Sorceries, enchantments. Stubble burned by fire (v14). Merchants wander (v15). Direct source for Rev 18.

NEW — Egypt oracle. Nation-against-nation (v2 = Mat 24:7 vocabulary). Sorceries (v3). Drunken stupor (v14). BUT unique: Egypt eventually healed (vv19-25) — 'blessed be Egypt my people.' Egypt CAN be redeemed; Babylon cannot. Key distinction.
NEW — Egypt oracle by Ezekiel. Pharaoh as dragon/serpent. Self-deification ('my river is mine'). Given to Nebuchadnezzar as wages. Egypt-Babylon connection explicit.

PRIORITY BOOST — Trumpet judgments. Third of TREES (nations) burnt. Mountain burning with fire cast into SEA (peoples). Star poisons waters. With symbol substitution = global-scale destruction of nations/peoples/commerce. Links to Zech 5 flying scroll.
NEW — Fifth/sixth trumpets. Smoke from pit. Locusts with crowns. Fire+smoke+brimstone kill third of men. Euphrates connection. 'Repented not' (v20-21) — sorceries, fornication = Babylon vocabulary.

GAP — H7105 qatsir (harvest) + H4038 maggal (sickle) + G2326 therismos + G1407 drepanon. Joel 3:13 = Rev 14:15-20 same vocabulary. Mat 13:39 'harvest is the end of the age.' Jer 50:16 sickle at Babylon's harvest. Feast of Harvest (Exo 23:16). CRITICAL end-cluster symbol.

GAP — Two harvests: grain-sickle (vv15-16) + grape-winepress (vv18-20). Joel 3:13 source text. 'Harvest of the earth is ripe' = Joel 3:13 'harvest is ripe.' Blood from winepress = Joel 3:13 'fats overflow.' Lamb on Mount Zion (v1) = Joel 3:16-17 LORD in Zion.
BIDIR — Joel 3 documents wine-inversion: wrath-winepress (v13) → blessing-newwine (v18). Same passage, same symbol, opposite valence. Add Joel 3:9-21 as dependent.
BIDIR — Joel 3:16-17 LORD roars from Zion/holy mountain + kingdom-assertion simultaneous with darkening + earthquake. Add Joel 3:9-21 as dependent.
BIDIR — Joel 3:17 'Jerusalem shall be holy, no strangers pass through' = Rev 21:27. V20 'Jerusalem from generation to generation.' Add Joel 3:9-21 as dependent.

COMPLETED — Full study. Etymology H4714=dual of H4693 matsôwr=siege from H6696 tsûwr (same root as ROCK). Provision→dependence→bondage mechanism. Pharaoh=dragon. Plague template→Rev bowls. Isa 19:2=Mat 24:7 source. Four-faces framework (Egypt/Tyre/Sodom/Babylon). HEALABLE unlike Babylon.

GAP — No pipeline study. Nile→blood (Exod 7:20) = first plague. Rev 16:3-4 sea+rivers→blood. Rev 6:12 moon as blood. Joel 2:30 blood+fire+smoke. Ezek 32:6 water with blood. Co-occurring with EGYPT, SUN_MOON_STARS, FIRE, SEA.

GAP — H8577 tanniyn = dragon/sea-monster/serpent. Pharaoh as tanniyn (Ezek 29:3, 32:2). Rev 12:9 'great dragon, old serpent.' Links animal + sea + egypt. Distinct from H5175 nachash (serpent) but overlapping.
GAP — H1060 bekor. Exod 12:29 final plague. Ps 78:51. Israel IS God's firstborn (Exod 4:22). Christ firstborn (Col 1:15). Church of firstborn (Heb 12:23). Death of firstborn = system's ultimate cost.

GAP — H3843 lebenah. Gen 11:3 Babylon's building material (brick for stone). Exod 1:14 Israel enslaved making brick. Man-made || God-given (ROCK/STONE). Isa 9:10 'bricks fallen, build with hewn stones' = arrogance.

GAP — H2388 chazaq + H3515 kabed + H7185 qashah. 13× in Exodus. System's defining refusal. God hardens AND Pharaoh hardens = dual agency. Rev 16:9,11 'repented not' = same pattern. Rom 9:17-18 theological anchor.

BIDIR — Egypt study formalizes four-faces framework (Egypt=bondage, Tyre=commercial, Sodom=moral, Babylon=whole). Add egypt.md [1, 1.00] as input. Etymology connection: Mitsrayim root H6696 = same as ROCK.
BIDIR — Isa 19:2 is SOURCE TEXT for Mat 24:7 vocabulary. Egypt oracle predates 2Chr 15:6 usage. Add egypt.md as input.
BIDIR — Egypt study formalizes four-faces framework. Tyre=commercial face needs update to cross-reference.
STUB EXISTS. Babylon's commercial face. Ezek 27 = Rev 18 template. 'Fire from midst of thee' (28:18). Traffick = corrupting commerce.

STUB EXISTS. Zech 5:1-4 + Ezek 2:9-10 + Rev 5:1. Written both sides. Curse over whole earth. Consumes timber AND stones. Dimensions 30ft x 15ft. H5774 uph = fly/darkness derivatives. CRITICAL for literal-fulfillment analysis.

GAP — H5777 ophereth. Seals the wickedness-ephah (Zech 5:7-8). Exod 15:10 'sank as lead in mighty waters.' Ezek 27:12 Tyre trades in lead. Zech 5:7 talent of lead = containment/shielding. Only material that shields radiation.
GAP — H423 alah = covenant imprecation/oath-curse. Zech 5:3 the curse on the flying scroll. Deut 27-28 blessing/curse duality. Connects to covenant-mechanism framework.
GAP — Babylon's moral-corruption face. Fire from heaven (Gen 19:24). Extraction before destruction (Lot). Luke 17:29 paired with Days of Noah. Rev 11:8 Jerusalem called 'Sodom.'

STUB EXISTS. H2719 chereb = desolation-maker (root H2717 charab). Isa 34:5 sword BATHED IN HEAVEN (H7301 ravah = saturated in sky) → comes DOWN. ICBM trajectory. Sword+fire pair. Root shared with Horeb/Sinai (H2722). Gen 3:24 flaming sword. Rev 19:15 Word=sword.

GAP — H2764 cherem = total destruction protocol / the ban / devoted thing. Isa 34:5 'people of my cherem.' Mal 4:6 LAST WORD OF OT threatens earth with cherem. Zech 14:11 'no more cherem' = resolution. Josh 6-7 Jericho protocol. Connected to flying-scroll curse and sword-bathed-in-heaven.

CRITICAL — heavens rolled as scroll (v4) + sword bathed in heaven (v5) + cherem (v5) + fire/brimstone (v9) + unquenchable smoke forever (v10) + thorns in palaces (v13). Complete destruction sequence. Cross-ref 2Pet 3:10, Rev 6:14, Rev 18:9.

NEW — Last 6 verses of OT. Burning day as oven (v1). Sun of righteousness (v2). Dual-function fire (Mal 3:2-3 + 4:1). v6 = CHEREM threatened on earth. Elijah sent first. Heart-turning OR total destruction.
STUB EXISTS. H6158 oreb = darkness-bird. Root H6150 arab = grow dusky. Gen 8:7 to-and-fro over flood. Isa 34:11 inhabits cherem-land. 1Ki 17:4-6 feeds Elijah. Nebuchadnezzar = raven-king (Dan 4).
GAP — H7751 shut = push forth, row, lash. Derivative H7752 = scourge/whip. Raven (Gen 8:7), Satan (Job 1:7), God's eyes (2Chr 16:9), Tyre's rowers (Ezek 27:8), Dan 12:4 end-times. Structural pattern.

NEW — Nebuchadnezzar's tree→beast transformation. TREE (nation) hewn. Eats GRASS (people) as oxen. Eagle feathers + bird claws = raven-king. 7 times = complete covenant cycle. Restored when acknowledges heaven. Babylon's king can repent; Babylon's SYSTEM cannot.

NEW — Raven vs dove. Raven = to-and-fro, never returns, at home in death-world. Dove = seeks rest, returns, brings olive leaf (life-sign). Babylon-spirit vs covenant-spirit. Flood = water judgment → 2Pet 3 fire judgment parallel.

NEW — Ravens (unclean/Babylon-instrument) feed Elijah at brook CHERITH (H3747 from H3772 karath = CUT/COVENANT). God uses Babylon's agents to sustain covenant prophet. Drought judgment. Widow of Zarephath. Three-stretch resurrection = third-day pattern.

NEW — First weapon in Scripture. Flaming sword (H3858 lahat = blaze/enwrapping + H2719 chereb = desolation) that turns every way (H2015 haphak = overturns, same word as Sodom's overthrow). Guards way to tree of life. Cherubim connection to Ezek 28:14 covering cherub.
BIDIR — flying-scroll study will add Zech 5 weapon-delivery connections. Babylon receives back its own wickedness.
BIDIR — Zech 5 woman=wickedness sealed in lead. Payload dimension. H7564 rish'ah = G458 anomia connection to 2Th 2:7.
BIDIR — Babylon connection: thorns = people of Babylon-system. Isa 9:18 wickedness devours thorns. Isa 10:17 thorns burned in one day = Rev 18:8. Thorns = fuel for Babylon's fire.
BIDIR — Tyre/Egypt/Sodom/Shinar synonym connections. Ezek 27→Rev 18 template. Zech 5 weapon-delivery mechanism. Fire-from-within (Ezek 28:18).
COMPLETED — Rev 2: self-consuming fire pattern added (Ezek 28:18, Isa 47:14). Babylon burns from within.

GAP — G4973 sphragis / G4972 sphragizo. Seals on scroll (Rev 5-6) = restraint of judgment. Seals on servants (Rev 7:3) = protection from judgment. Same root, inverse operations. Eph 1:13 sealed with Spirit. 2Cor 1:22. Critical mechanism symbol.
GAP — Four chariots = four spirits. Two mountains of brass. Directly decoded by angel. Must integrate four-horsemen, wind, four-winds studies.
GAP — First horse vision. Man among myrtle trees. Walk to and fro. Earth at rest. 'How long?' question. 70-year context.
GAP — Four winds held. Sealing of 144,000. Inverse-mechanism to seal-opening. Critical Rev 6 companion.
GAP — Four sore judgments source. Noah/Daniel/Job exception. Only righteous escape. Direct source for Rev 6:8 tetrad.
GAP — Four winds strive on sea → four beasts rise. Mechanism: spirits stir nations → kingdoms emerge. Four-horsemen connection.
BIDIR — four-horsemen study proves four winds = four horsemen = four spirits. Full study needed, currently stub.
BIDIR — four-horsemen connection needs documenting. Wind study already references Zech 6:5 but needs four-horsemen as co-occurring.
BIDIR — four-horsemen study adds Rev 6 structural parallel to Mat 24 tetrad. White horse = deception confirmation.
BIDIR — Rev 6:5-6 black horse study adds balances (G2218 zugos) detail. Oil+wine protected.
BIDIR — Rev 6:8 thanatos = LXX deber confirmation. Pale horse = pestilence explicitly.
BIDIR — Four zoon (G2226) as dispatchers of horsemen vs therion (G2342) as beasts of earth in 6:8. Critical zoon/therion distinction.
BIDIR — White horse = deception mechanism. Bow (G5115 toxon) = distance weapon = deception's mode. Crown given (not inherent) = counterfeit authority.
BIDIR — Four seals = birth-pains mechanism. Horsemen ride in cycles, escalating. Seals = contractions.
BIDIR — Rev 9:1-12 context adds: smoke AS THE MECHANISM explicitly stated. Star-fall = fallen authority releasing smoke. Update darkening oracle #15 with full integration.
BIDIR — Rev 9 locust-king Abaddon = precursor to Rev 11:7 beast from abyss. Same pit, same smoke, same emergence pattern. Locust army as proto-beast agents.
BIDIR — Rev 9:2 smoke from pit = Rev 18:9,18 smoke of Babylon burning. Pit = source of Babylon's smoke. Mechanism link confirmed.
BIDIR — Rev 9 composite creature: locusts+horses+lions+scorpions. Compound-animal symbolism. Each component = characterized people-type merged into one destructive agent.
BIDIR — Rev 9:11 bilingual naming of Abaddon/Apollyon. Name=covenant applied: destroyer named in BOTH covenant languages = universal anti-covenant scope.
BIDIR — 5 months = 150 days = flood duration (Gen 7:24). New flood-pattern echo in Rev 9.
NEW — 150 days (Gen 7:24) = 5 months = Rev 9:5,10 locust torment duration. Flood narrative as prototype for judgment patterns.

completed.notes: Rev 2 — translation-narrowing analysis added. G4578=commotion not just earthquake. Mat 8:24 tempest proof.
Rev 2 — synonyms added: Egypt, Shinar, Tyre, Sodom. Thorns/wickedness connections. Zech 5 payload analysis.
Four horsemen = four winds = four spirits (Zech 6:5). Rev 6 + Zech 6 + Zech 1 + Ezek 14:21 + Mat 24:4-8 alignment.
Four seals context. Five-passage structural parallel. Seal/wind mechanism. Fulfillment audit across eras.
Fifth trumpet/first woe. Smoke=mechanism of darkening. Isa 24:22 pit. 5 months=150 days flood. Abaddon/Apollyon bilingual. Grass/tree substitution. 7/7 roadmap convergence.
15/15 symbol convergence. PIT=abyss. TOHU=creation-reversal. v23=Rev 11:15. Isaiah Apocalypse anchor.
Army=smoke=darkening. Northern army=Babylon. Dual trumpet. v30 smoke chain. Spirit=witness period. Birth-pains+earthquake+darkening=Rev 6:12. NAME=covenant.
